definition: A term commonly employed to describe the state or quality of being engaged in actions, tasks, or movements. It is often used to refer to various forms of physical or mental activities, such as exercises, hobbies, work-related tasks, or recreational pursuits.

examples.german: Wir planen eine Aktivität für das Wochenende.
examples.english: We are planning an activity for the weekend.

examples.german: Die Schule bietet viele außerschulische Aktivitäten an.
examples.english: The school offers many extracurricular activities.

examples.german: Er ist immer auf der Suche nach neuen Aktivitäten.
examples.english: He is always looking for new activities.

examples.german: Die Aktivität der Vögel nimmt im Frühling zu.
examples.english: The activity of birds increases in spring.
